text: This restaurant offers superb service and tasty menu. My favourite place in town. The food came out quickly and the rates were inexpensive. Highly recommended.

text: My youngest son is crazy about their p'zones!  I got nothing but good things to say about the speed of getting our order done, the politeness and helpfulness of all the staff and the quality of the food, keep up the great work guys and gals! üòä

name: Joe Collins
text: Pizza Hut is Pizza Hut but writing this review more as an informative review. Pizza Hut has a gluten free pizza that is GREAT. My wife has a gluten allergy and most of the GF foods I've tried have not been good. PH's gluten free pizza is DELICIOUS though! I'd buy it again for myself!

text: Maybe I've had enough of Pizza Hut? Way too much marenara sauce, not enough pepperoni, chicken wings not cooked inside, sauce tastes funny, slow service 5 minutes late, I guess their sauces just don't taste good anymore. And expensive, also.
